modName: Unique shapes for Unique weapons TS Edition
summary: Many unique(named) weapons in Skyrim have their own forms
descriptionHtml:
VERSION 1.400

 - Added unique bows and more weapons
 - Modified some textures
 - 1hd swords and daggers have got scabbards
 - minor bug fix

----------------------------------------------------------

VERSION 1.300

 - Added unique staves (Check the weapon list on bottom on this page)

----------------------------------------------------------

VERSION 1.200

 - Modified color of several weapons (more darker, less colourful)
 - Added more weapons
 - Trollsbane has a new mesh (Giant\'s club)

----------------------------------------------------------

This mod makes every unique weapons have their own forms.

Never modified their options but meshes and textures.

Well, actually I don\'t know how 3D tool really works, so that it just changed some meshes and textures in vanila Skyrim.

You can change their meshes into anything you want by yourself.

----------------------------------------------------------

INSTALLATION

Download it with Modmanager

OR

Download it manually and put files into each folders

----------------------------------------------------------

CAUTION

This mod might conflict with another mods which modifies unique or legendary weapons

----------------------------------------------------------

Weapons List ver 1.400

Bolar\'s Oathblade
Briarheart Geis

Woods man\'s friend

----------------------------------------------------------
